RTCPeerConnectionRemovestream_event.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The obsolete removestream event was sent to an to inform it that a had been removed from the connection.
You can use the RTCPeerConnection interface's onremovestream property to set a handler for this event.

remarks.para: This is the counterpart to the event, which is also obsolete.

blockquote.para: Warning: This event has been removed from the WebRTC specification in favor of the existing event on the remote and the corresponding event handler property of the remote . The API is now track-based, so having zero tracks in the remote stream is equivalent to the remote stream being removed, which caused a removestream event.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
